intent_atoms.description: Implement app theming with accent palette and light/dark modes for ISOInspector SwiftUI app
The brand accent color must be shared across all controls via isoInspectorAppTheme() modifier
Unit tests cover WCAG-AA contrast coverage for ISOInspectorBrandPalette
Use Assets.xcassets catalog to store accent and surface color variants
Generate production app icon raster assets from approved vector design and wire filenames into AppIcon.appiconset
App icon filenames must match the approved vector design naming convention

functional_units.name: ISOInspectorBrandPalette
functional_units.description: Provides a brand accent palette with WCAG-AA contrast coverage and unit tests for measurability

functional_units.name: Assets.xcassets catalog
functional_units.description: Holds SwiftUI app color assets including accent and surface variants for light/dark modes

functional_units.name: isoInspectorAppTheme() modifier
functional_units.description: Applies the brand accent across the app shell, sharing theme colors with controls
